title: Capacity-Building Course for Designing High-Quality Online Learning Materials

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and online learning experience
context.additional_context: Customized practice-oriented design education for working professionals

learning_goals: Apply three or more quality criteria for online learning materials in alignment with the design and development phases of the ADDIE model.
Incorporate two or more collaborative learning strategies to enhance learner autonomy into design documents.
Utilize multimodality and personalization principles to produce visual materials applicable to practical instructional design tasks.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
